name: aSUGAR
description: Jiko is a DeFi yield optimizer gamified as a PvP idle card game. Users stake in single-sided pools to earn yield while powering up their cardsâ€”whose stats scale with token and NFT prices. By integrating liquid staking, CDPs (collateralized debt positions), and gamification, Jiko transforms passive financial activities into a dynamic player-versus-player (PvP) experience. Built natively on Berachain, it introduces a new era where financial acumen and PvP strategy work hand-in-hand.
